Scripts.OnClick: LBSaved.DTPS = 1; self:SetChecked(true);
Lifebloomer_SlashCommand();
Lifebloomer_SlashCommand("s");
Lifebloomer_SlashCommand("h");
Lifebloomer_SlashCommand("r");
Lifebloomer_SlashCommand("l");
LBSaved.DTPS = 2; self:SetChecked(true);
Lifebloomer_SlashCommand("p");
Lifebloomer_SlashCommand("ra");

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Auto Create Raid Frames Without Distubing Player Set Frames

Scripts.OnClick: Lifebloomer_SlashCommand("sr");

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Reset All Settings to the New Default Values

Scripts.OnClick: Lifebloomer_SlashCommand("dn");

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Reset All Settings to the Classic Default Values

Scripts.OnClick: Lifebloomer_SlashCommand("dc");

Scripts.OnLoad: self.name = "Lifebloomer"; InterfaceOptions_AddCategory(self);
